title: Honor
body:
my honor level was reset (sadly, because i was toxic :/) around 5-6 months ago (I THINK) and since the new season is starting i was wondering how long i should expect for my honor to start leveling again. 

I'm aware anyone below honor level 2 will remain at that honor, but since its almost been half a year i was wondering if anyone knew how much longer i should expect it to take for my honor to start leveling again

If theres anything i can do to help my honor progress farther please inform me

Thank you!

replies.body: It's all about consistency, honestly.  As long as you are continuing to play without contributing towards negative experiences, your honor will grow up at a fast past.  If you have hiccups in between though, it can slow down.  There's no progress bar to tell you, but only when reform is constant.
